column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man climbed up a tree and hanged himself  in front of Preah Ket Mealea hospital.------The incident occurred at 3 am on November 2
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column8: an unidentified 40-year-old man had been seen hanging around the area for a few days. He some sort of noose and quickly scaled up the tree. Some people tried to stop him
column9: but couldnâ€™t get to him. Halfway up the tree
column10: tied the noose around his neck and hanged himself
column11: causing much shock to those at the scene.------After the incident
column12: local authorities came to inspect the body
